examples.korean: Developments on this issue will be dealt with in a subsequent report. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 쟁점에 대한 새로운 사실들은 차후의 보고서에서 다룰 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: What are your plans for the next few years? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 차후 수 년 간의 계획은 무엇입니까? DARAKWON
examples.english: What are your plans for the next few years? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: In the future, this can become a distinct advantage over other CPAs. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 차후 이 점이 다른 공인 회계사들과 차별되는 분명한 이점이 될 수 있을 것입니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: In the future, this can become a distinct advantage over other CPAs. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I'd like to have the opportunity to work in a plant as well as at the home office. I also hope to develop my management skills, perhaps by managing a small staff. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 저는 차후에 본사뿐만 아니라 공장에서 일할 기회를 갖고 싶습니다. 또한 소규모팀을 관리하며 관리 능력을 키우고 싶습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I'd like to have the opportunity to work in a plant as well as at the home office. I also hope to develop my management skills, perhaps by managing a small staff. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I believe this job will offer me the opportunity to be a part of such a negotiating team. This way I can begin to acquire the skills necessary to lead a team. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 일을 하면 우수한 협상 팀에서 일할 기회가 있을 것으로 생각하며 차후에는 팀을 이끌어가는 데 필요한 능력도 얻게 되리라 봅니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I believe this job will offer me the opportunity to be a part of such a negotiating team. This way I can begin to acquire the skills necessary to lead a team. Add to Wordbook
